segments.text: Good morning.Mr.Green.My name is Helen.What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I read in the poster that you're looking for a student to work as a language assistant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.Are you interested in the job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so.But before I apply , could you tell me more about the work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you eve worked with tape recorders before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I used cassette recorders a lot when I studied English in high school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good.There are many different kind of language labs , but ours is a small one.If you decide to take the job , I'll explain how to operate the system , Are you sure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many hours would I work a day and what's the pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ten hours a week.From Monday to Friday , from 4 to 6 P . m . , and $ 150 a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine.Please fill out the application form .
segments.speaker: S2
